Text:
Love it...thanks! Great stuff as always!

Any chance of this one? I don't see anyone else providing this....

http://www.stardock.com/products/fences/features.asp

FYI:I installed and registered no problem, but after burning a Windows Password recovery bootdisk from it on both CD and USB, the bootdisk boots and claims it cannot reset the user password because it is a trial edition. This is despite the fact it required the registration key to even burn the boot disk!
